message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $75?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
